(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN post))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN brought)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (PRP you)))
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Grand) (NNP Park) (NNP Kunming) (NNP China))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ vast) (NN country)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(post-2, This-1)
nsubjpass(brought-4, post-2)
auxpass(brought-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, brought-4)
prep(brought-4, to-5)
pobj(to-5, you-6)
prep(brought-4, by-7)
nn(China-11, Grand-8)
nn(China-11, Park-9)
nn(China-11, Kunming-10)
pobj(by-7, China-11)
cop(country-15, is-12)
det(country-15, a-13)
amod(country-15, vast-14)
rcmod(China-11, country-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (VP (VBN amazed)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB think)
              (NP (DT that))
              (PP (IN over)
                (ADVP
                  (NP (CD 2000) (NNS years))
                  (RB ago))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (SINV
    (VP (VBD managed)
      (SBAR
        (SBAR
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB unite)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN whole))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP China))))
                (PP (IN under)
                  (NP (PRP$ his) (NN rule)))))))
        (CC and)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD managed)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB do)
                    (SBAR (IN that)
                      (FRAG
                        (WHADVP (WRB when))))))))))))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJS fastest) (NN vehicle))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBD had))
          (, ,))))))

prep(unite-3, under-8)
poss(rule-10, his-9)
pobj(under-8, rule-10)

mark(managed-14, that-12)
nsubj(managed-14, he-13)
conj(unite-3, managed-14)
aux(do-16, to-15)
xcomp(managed-14, do-16)
mark(when-18, that-17)
dep(do-16, when-18)
det(vehicle-21, the-19)
amod(vehicle-21, fastest-20)
nsubj(managed-1, vehicle-21)
nsubj(had-23, they-22)

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN area))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT which))
        (S

            (ADVP (RB now))
            (VP (VBN known)
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN province))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP Yunnan))))))))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN considered)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN outback))
          (CC or)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ wild) (JJ wild) (NN West)))))
    (. .)))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN stone) (NNS formations))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADJP (JJ natural)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN told)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (RB wonderfully) (JJ green)
              (CC and)
              (JJ lush) (NN grass))
            (ADVP (RB actually))
            (VP (VBZ comes)
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP US))))))))
    (. !)))

  (S

                  (NP (CD one))

                        (NP (DT a) (NN sword))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the)
            (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ prolific))
            (JJ fossil) (NN excavation) (NNS sites)))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (NN world)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBN told)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (CD one) (JJ fascinating) (NN feature))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NNS fossils))))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP they))
                  (VP (VBD were) (RB all)
                    (VP (VBN buried)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG facing)
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN direction)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

det(itinerary-10, the-8)
amod(itinerary-10, selected-9)
pobj(in-7, itinerary-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNS Participants))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB pre-select)
        (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ ideal) (NN holiday) (NN package))
        (PP (VBN based)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS themes))
              (PP (JJ such) (IN as)
                (NP (NN Adventure))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(pre-select-3, Participants-1)
aux(pre-select-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, pre-select-3)
poss(package-7, their-4)
amod(package-7, ideal-5)
nn(package-7, holiday-6)
dobj(pre-select-3, package-7)
prep(pre-select-3, based-8)
pcomp(based-8, on-9)
pobj(on-9, themes-10)
mwe(as-12, such-11)
prep(themes-10, as-12)
pobj(as-12, Adventure-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Culture))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Culture-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Gourmet)
      (CC or)
      (VB Romance))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Gourmet-1)
cc(Gourmet-1, or-2)
conj(Gourmet-1, Romance-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Simply))
    (VP
      (VP (VB share)
        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ your)
            (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ memorable))
            (NN moment))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Unlimited) (NNPS Discoveries) (NN website)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP
          (NP (CD one))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (CD 50) (JJ lucky) (NNS winners))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(share-2, Simply-1)
root(ROOT-0, share-2)
poss(moment-6, your-3)
advmod(memorable-5, most-4)
amod(moment-6, memorable-5)
dobj(share-2, moment-6)
prep(moment-6, on-7)
det(website-11, the-8)
nn(website-11, Unlimited-9)
nn(website-11, Discoveries-10)
pobj(on-7, website-11)
cc(share-2, and-12)
cop(one-14, be-13)
conj(share-2, one-14)
prep(one-14, of-15)
det(winners-19, the-16)
num(winners-19, 50-17)
amod(winners-19, lucky-18)
pobj(of-15, winners-19)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHNP (WP What))
    (S
      (VP (VBZ 's)
        (ADJP (JJR more)))
      (, ,))))


nsubj(more-3, What-1)
cop(more-3, 's-2)
root(ROOT-0, more-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB choose)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB upload)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ memorable) (NN photo))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NN entry)))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB stand)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB win)
              (NP
                (NP (DT an) (JJ additional)
                  (QP (CD SGD$) (CD 5,000)))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (NN cash)))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, choose-1)
aux(upload-3, to-2)
xcomp(choose-1, upload-3)
poss(photo-6, your-4)
amod(photo-6, memorable-5)
dobj(upload-3, photo-6)
prep(upload-3, with-7)
poss(entry-9, your-8)
pobj(with-7, entry-9)
cc(choose-1, and-10)
conj(choose-1, stand-11)
aux(win-13, to-12)
xcomp(stand-11, win-13)
det(5,000-17, an-14)
amod(5,000-17, additional-15)
number(5,000-17, SGD$-16)
dobj(win-13, 5,000-17)
prep(5,000-17, in-18)
pobj(in-18, cash-19)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RB Participate))
      (IN in)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NNP Unlimited) (NNP Discoveries) (NN campaign))
        (ADVP (RB now))))
    (NP (RB here))
    (: :)))


advmod(in-2, Participate-1)
prep(here-8, in-2)
det(campaign-6, the-3)
nn(campaign-6, Unlimited-4)
nn(campaign-6, Discoveries-5)
pobj(in-2, campaign-6)
advmod(campaign-6, now-7)
root(ROOT-0, here-8)
